commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (We'd just happened to walk by a big screen in Akihabara, showing μ's and Aqours having a concert. It was the first school idol show Ayumu and I had ever seen.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa!

commands.speaker: Passerby
commands.line: Oh, sorry! You all right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I am, but...what's the crowd for? Is something happening?

commands.speaker: Passerby
commands.line: μ's and Aqours are having a joint concert, and it's being broadcast all over the country! You two didn't come to see it?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: μ's and Aqours? You mean the school idols?

commands.speaker: Passerby
commands.line: Yeah! Looks like you're really lucky. This is the biggest screen you'll see them on, so watch if you've got time. You'll love it, I guarantee it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: R-Right...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hey, you all right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, sorry, I was just kind of...overwhelmed. Just, the show, and everyone cheering, it was all so...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, I know what you mean! It really felt like we were all in it together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think I really like school idols!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: So how'd we all like the μ's and Aqours show?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It was AMAZING!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sh-She's not gonna hear you through the screen.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh! Oh yeah. I just couldn't help myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I mean, it was just so awesome to watch! So exciting! I had so much fun I thought I'd cry, and I've never felt that before!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This is the first time I've really seen a school idol live show, and I had no idea they were this awesome! What have I been doing with my life?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Know what I mean, Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: E-Er, ah, sure, totally!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: So, my little demons... Are you ready to step through the School Idol Festival's gates?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: School Idol Festival?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: School idols and their fans love the festival! They're definitely going to be there!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: We're going to do our best to make it a great festival, so come and see us!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: A big festival for school idols, huh? I didn't know there was such a thing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Think there'll be shows like this one? Man, I want to check it out!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Haha, you've been totally starstruck.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: W-Well, you saw them, didn't you?! The show! The music! μ's and Aqours, they were just amazing!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I mean, I knew of school idols before, but actually seeing them like this... It blew me away.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, what do you think that School Idol Festival they were talking about is like?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Let me look it up real quick. Ah, here we go. Hm. Well, to put it really plainly, it's like a school culture festival?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A school culture festival? For school idols?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, check this out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's seriously this big an event?! There're so many school idols and so many shows...and there're even food stalls?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: And apparently, students like us run the whole thing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Seriously?! Wh-Whoa. They must really love school idols.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wanna go?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I totally do! Will you come with me?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sure will!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Groan* I just wish there were school idols in Nijigasaki, too. Then I could go cheer them on.
